entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH, BECOMING WEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 60
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT
